name: Twitter un-roundify
description: Taking this down due to the security issues concerning the stylish plugin
additional_info:
2018-07-08: Taking this down due to the security issues concerning the stylish plugin
2018-03-04: Added style for small avatar images indicating a thread start
2018-02-10: Added style for avatar detail view (the one that appears if you click on an avatar of a users feet)
2017-09-28: Added style settings for small, medium and large radius. Small is for avatar images in the timeline, buttons etc, medium is for profile cards and large corresponds to the main avatar image on user pages.
2017-09-26: Improved styles for direct messages in Chrome, maybe other browsers
2017-09-20: Added styles for user images in the direct message section.
2017-09-09: Avatar borders at the follower list are following the borders of the avatar images.
2017-09-04: Added style for the profile card, which is shown if you hover over an avatar on the timeline
2017-08-22: Release

discussions.name: Great!! Would it be possible to make avatars in Direct Message into their squares, too?
